gobblin.runtime.api

Interface GobblinInstanceDriver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JobLifecycleListenersContainer, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGobblinInstanceDriverImpl, StandardGobblinInstanceDriver

    @Alpha
public interface GobblinInstanceDriver
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service, JobLifecycleListenersContainer
    An interface that defines a Gobblin Instance driver which knows how to monitor for Gobblin JobSpecs and run them.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.State

      • getMutableJobCatalog

        MutableJobCatalog getMutableJobCatalog()
        Returns a mutable instance of the job catalog (if it implements the MutableJobCatalog interface). Implementation will throw ClassCastException if the current catalog is not mutable.
